title: Military robots and the future of war

content: Quite fascinating when you consider that we'll eventually have star wars machines in actual combat and cyborg Soldiers alongside them. I can even envision a time where people will willingly have their natural limbs amputated so that they can become "augmented". But what I find most fascinating is the nano technology that can have robotic bugs crawling around unnoticed in a population until it finds a genetic equation that will tell it to start the destruct process. Scary.
